mergeParams.query: select e.PRIMARY_ID as "PRIMARY_ID",e.WEIGHTUNIT as "weightUnit",e.QUALITY as "quality",substr(e.WNSDATE,0,instr(e.WNSDATE,' ')-1) as "wnsDate",e.GMRREFNO as "gmrRefNo",e.ARRIVALDATE as "arrivalDate",e.SUPPLIER as "supplier",e.MOISTURE as "moisture",e.SUPPLIERREFERENCEID as "supplierReferenceId",e.AVISEDNETWEIGHT as "avisedNetWeight",e.WETWEIGHT as "wetWeight",e.LATESTASSAYTYPE as "latestAssayType",e.CONTRACTDELIVERYITEM as "contractDeliveryItem",e.DRYWEIGHT as "dryWeight",e.INTERNALGMRREFNO as "internalGmrRefNo" ,substr(e.gmrRefNo,instr(e.gmrRefNo,'-')+1,instr(e.gmrRefNo,'-')+1) gmrNo_Substr from EXTERNAL_API2 e
